sentence.Network_en: These large populations facilitate the detection of rare mutational or recombinational events.

sentence.Network_en: All sorts of mutational damage to animals'DNA would have occurred.

sentence.Network_en: Doramectin, which is manufactured by mutational biosynthesis method, is a novel avermectin derivative.
